column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Ba-Ba is always a good time! You really can't go wrong when you come here
column2: but my only suggestion would be the more
column3: the merrier. If you go here by yourself
column4: you limit how many fantastic dishes you can try! I'm not usually big on fruity drinks either
column5: but their sangria is definitely the way to go! Stick to the original house red sangria for a nice treat; not too sweet and just the right amount of buzz to get you going to really elevate those tapas!
